articles.title: Shubman Gill Snubbed As Marnus Labuschagne Picks 'Next Batting Superstar' - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Australia batter Marnus Labuschagne snubbed India's Shubman Gill when asked about the 'next batting superstar'.
articles.content: Undoubtedly one of the finest batters in the global cricketing spectrum at the moment, Shubman Gill has been in the form of his life, especially in white-ball cricket, over the last couple of months.… [+1518 chars]
